net.dragondelve.customdriversutil.fx

Class FXObjectChooser<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dragondelve.customdriversutil.fx.FXObjectChooser<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Class of object that will choose by the user from a list of objects.

    public class FXObjectChooser<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Stage controller that displays a list of items to the user on the stage provided to it. When the user presses the okButton if a selection in the Table is made then it will return the item chosen if the selection in the table is not made then it will return null instead.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.String CANCEL_MESSAGE
      Message that is displayed in the table if the selection is not made in the table.
      private static java.lang.String OK_MESSAGE
      Message that is displayed on the okButton if the selection is made in the table.
      private javafx.scene.layout.VBox rootPane
      Root pane of the scene of this stage.
      private javafx.stage.Stage stage
      Stage on which FXObjectChooser is going to be displayed.
      private javafx.scene.control.TableView<T> tableView
      TableView that displays the items chosen by the user.

    • Method Detail

      • showChooseDialog

        public T showChooseDialog()
        Shows the FXObjectChooser to the user and waits until the user presses the okButton.
        Returns:
        item selected by the user if the selection is made or null if the selection is not made.

      • setItems

        public void setItems(javafx.collections.ObservableList<T> items)
        Sets items to the TableView should be called
        Parameters:
